attributes.action: UK Government reconsider the advice on non essential travel to all of Spain.
attributes.additional_details: I have already alluded to the implications for the tourism sector. Consideration also needs to be shown to the thousands of UK individual owners of holiday properties in Southern Spain. We have only just begun to recover the losses incurred by refunds of cancelled bookings. The decision to re impose quarantine will cause untold personal hardship to these people and their clients.
attributes.background: The decision to re impose quarantine on travellers returning from anywhere in Spain is ill judged and needs to be reconsidered with quarantine being imposed on travellers from the regions suffering spikes in Covid 19. The current decisions is going to have devastating consequences for tourism sector
